title: A Full relation of a barbarous murther committed upon the body of Esq. Beddingfield on Sunday the 20th day of July 1684 by Mr. Barney as also the further account of the tryal and conviction of the said Mr. Barney, who is to be executed for the same, at the Market-cross in Norwich, on Friday the first day of August, 1684.
notes: Reproduction of the original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
